form.h3: دوسرے سینٹر میں رجسٹرڈ بچّوں کا فالو اپ رجسٹر برائے ٹیکاجات - Off Site Child Follow Up Vaccination Register

label.span:
Shehr:
; Town:
; UC:
; Center ka Naam:
Teeka lagnay ki tareekh, bachay ki tareekh-e-pedaaish ke baad aur aaj ki tareekh se pehlay honi chahiye.
The date of vaccination must be greater than the child's birthdate and less than today.

legend.span: Kya aap ka ghar ka pata badla hai?

option.data-items-path: instance('ucs')/root/item[(province= /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/province and city= /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/city_village and town= /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/town ) or town='na']

label.span: Hasil karda malomaat ki jaga ke GPS coordinates darj karain
Collect GPS coordinates of data entry location:
GPS coordinates can only be collected when outside.

legend.span: Kya aap agli vaccine ke liye yad dahani SMS mausool karna chahtay hain?
Are you willing to receive SMS reminders for your next visit?

label.span: Phone number 11 hindason par mushtamil aur mundarja zail shakal main hona chahiey: 03*********
Phone number should be 11 digits in the following format: 03*********

option.data-items-path: instance('vaccines')/root/item[(name = 'bcg' and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_bcg = '') or (name = 'opv0' and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_opv0 = '') or (name = 'penta1' and number( /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/existing_age ) > 35 and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_penta1 = '') or (name = 'pcv1' and number( /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/existing_age ) > 35 and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_pcv1 = '') or (name = 'opv1' and number( /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/existing_age ) > 35 and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_opv1 = '') or (name = 'penta2' and number( /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/existing_age ) > 63 and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_penta2 = '') or (name = 'pcv2' and number( /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/existing_age ) > 63 and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_pcv2 = '') or (name = 'opv2' and number( /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/existing_age ) > 63 and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_opv2 = '') or (name = 'penta3' and number( /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/existing_age ) > 91 and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_penta3 = '') or (name = 'pcv3' and number( /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/existing_age ) > 91 and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_pcv3 = '') or (name = 'opv3' and number( /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/existing_age ) > 91 and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_opv3 = '') or (name = 'ipv' and number( /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/existing_age ) > 91 and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_ipv = '') or (name = 'measles1' and number( /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/existing_age ) > 250 and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_measles1 = '') or (name = 'measles2' and number( /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/existing_age ) > 340 and /Offsite_Child_Vaccination_Followup/e_measles2 = '')]

label.span: Teeka lagnay ki tareekh, bachay ki tareekh-e-pedaaish ke baad aur aaj ki tareekh se pehlay honi chahiye.
